Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: This is the $(this.trait:streetportion) portion of $(this.trait:streetname) $[capitalize($this."trait:streettype")]. This is an area regulated for trade and socialization. Morning has broken and the first rays of sunshine can be seen shimmering down. The sun has risen and the hustle and bustle of the market is audible. The midday sun is high in the sky and waves of heat can be seen shimmering off the bricks of the ground. The bright blue skies of the afternoon bathe every corner of Market Circle in sunlight. The sun has set and Market Circle is shadowed in the failing light. Evening has fallen and Market Circle is dimmed. There is a slight chill in the air. Midnight has enveloped the silent market. A slight lightening of the sky bathes the circle in an eerie light as dawn approaches. $[if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 0) { return "There are no visible exits.";} else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 1) { return "There is a single exit from here to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 2) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 3) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 4) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 5) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 6) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 7) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 8) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 9) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[8])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else if(sizeof($this."base:dirs:local") == 10) { return "The exits from here are to the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[0])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[2])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[3])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[4])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[5])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[6])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[7])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[8])+ ", " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[9])+ " and the " +Str($this."base:dirs:local"[1])+ "."; } else { return "There are multiple exits visible."; }]

This is the $(this.trait:streetportion) portion of $(this.trait:streetname) $[capitalize($this."trait:streettype")]. The circle is well lit by bright sunlight. The circle is enfolded in the cloak of night.
One of a series of countless bricks paving the circle. They are vitrified ruddy brick pavers laid in a large circle. One would have to be in flight over Market Circle to see the full effect.
One of a series of countless bricks paving the circle.

The ground is created from a series of countless bricks paving the circle. They are vitrified ruddy brick pavers laid in a large circle. One would have to be in flight over Market Circle to see the full effect.
The ground is created from a series of countless bricks paving the circle.
